message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.SD. 

The paper proposes a new approach to weakly supervised classification, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of machine learning. The paper discusses the use of a convex relaxation of the soft-max loss, which is a technique commonly used in optimization and convex programming. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the use of clustering tasks, which falls under the sub-category cs.CL (Computation and Language). Finally, the paper proposes an algorithm to solve a semidefinite program, which falls under the sub-category cs.SD (Systems and Control).
